text: The relative synonymous codon usage ( RSCU ) values , effective number of codon ( ENC ) values , nucleotide contents and dinucleotides were investigated and a comparative analysis of codon usage pattern for open reading frames ( ORFs ) among 48 polioviruses isolates including 31 of genotype 1 , 13 of genotype 2 and 4 of genotype 3 .
